mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Entry Element QuestionnaireResponse

Documentation:

A structured set of questions and their answers. The questions are ordered and grouped into coherent subsets, corresponding to the structure of the grouping of the questionnaire being responded to.

Ancestors:
  • Resource
    • DomainResource
      • QuestionnaireResponse
Used By:
  • DerivedFrom, 
  • ObservationDerivedFrom

      QuestionnaireResponsePartOf

      A procedure or observation that this questionnaire was performed as part of the execution of. For example, the surgery a checklist was executed as part of.

      The Questionnaire that defines and organizes the questions for which answers are being provided.

      FocalSubject

      The person or entity that the information in this resource relates to, if different than the person of record. The subject of information can be a reference or a code, the latter when the subject is described generically, for example, in terms of a relationship to the subject of record (e.g., wife).
      DataType
      Cardinality

      The recorder of the information, who received and recorded the answers. For example, the nurse taking a list of medications reported by the patient.
